sentences.sContent: Python: how to return from generator function using tornado?
sentences.sContent_eng: Python: how to return from generator function using tornado?
sentences.sCn: 如何从生成器函数返回使用龙卷风?。

sentences.sContent: This part of the community really shows you the randomness and intensity of the tornado.
sentences.sContent_eng: This part of the community really shows you the randomness and intensity of the tornado.
sentences.sCn: 这部分的社区真的向你展示了龙卷风的随机性和强度。

sentences.sContent: The phenomenon is believed to be down to a mini tornado which touched down elsewhere, sucking apples from the ground or from trees.
sentences.sContent_eng: The phenomenon is believed to be down to a mini tornado which touched down elsewhere, sucking apples from the ground or from trees.
sentences.sCn: 据信这一现象可能是由于附近某处的果园有小型的龙卷风出现，把苹果从地上或树上揪下来了。

synos.tran: [气象]龙卷风；旋风；暴风；大雷雨

remMethod.val: torn(转动) + ado → 能转动万物的风 → 飓风， 龙卷风

trans.tranOther: an extremely violent storm consisting of air that spins very quickly and causes a lot of damage
